product_name: BIC Sport ACE-TEC Wing Stand Up Paddleboard - 11'
long_description: With a shape meant for speed and all the features of an easy-to-paddle, stable board, the BIC Sport ACE-TEC Wing 11 ft. stand up paddleboard creates a smooth experience in the water.
short_description: With a shape meant for speed and all the features of an easy-to-paddle, stable board, the BIC Sport ACE-TEC Wing 11 ft. stand up paddleboard creates a smooth experience in the water.
